meanings.definition: to work together or cooperate closely
meanings.sent1: The team interworked to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The ants interworked to build their anthill efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The siblings interworked to create a surprise for their parents.
meanings.sent4: The gears interworked smoothly to keep the clock ticking.
meanings.sent5: The dancers interworked seamlessly to perform a flawless routine.

meanings.sent1: The different departments interworked to ensure a successful event.
meanings.sent2: The roads interworked to connect the various neighborhoods.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces interworked perfectly to reveal the picture.
meanings.sent4: The stories in the book interworked to form a captivating plot.
meanings.sent5: The branches of the tree interworked to create a dense canopy.
